title: Systems Software Engineer, Platform Architecture
description: Apple’s Platform Architecture group is seeking a systems engineer to build high performance functional models of advanced SoC designs...
key_qualifications: Background in low-level software, operating systems, or compilers. Excellent programming (C++/C) and scripting skills (Python). Assembly experience a plus. Proficiency with debugging large, complex system software. Experience with kernel, driver and firmware development a plus. Experience with modeling and simulation a plus. Knowledge of ARM and/or X86 architectures a plus.
education_experience: BS degree. Computer Science or Computer Engineering degree preferred
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $55.64 and $83.75/hr, and your base pay will depend on your skills...
